h2_title: Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide
content: Otherwise, you can also try keeping your distance and strafing during initial poison volleys, and then rush back in so you don't have to dance around poison when getting close.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Otherwise, you can also try keeping your distance and strafing during initial poison volleys, and then rush back in so you don't have to dance around poison when getting close.
